name: Sky Dragon Dash
description:
Control your little dragon to defeat wild boars running around and snakes shooting venom and rob the treasure they guard!
Gameplay:
-Control direction the dragon fly and rush to on the left. Control dragon to spit fire balls on right.
-Knock away or blow away wild boars by fire ball. These are options.
Features:
-Lovely little dragon is
-Operate on left and right to test your hand speed and reaction.
-Slow motion effect, bringing cool experience of spiting fireballs.
-Abundant skill options help you conquer around.
